short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mirror your device to any computer screen any time
short.ja: お使いのデバイスをいつでもお好きなコンピューター画面にミラーリング
short.zh_CN: 随时将您的设备镜像到任何计算机屏幕上
short.zh_TW: 隨時將您的裝置鏡像到任何電腦螢幕上

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Crestron AirMedia® Wireless Presentation solutions enable seamless collaboration in any space. Share audio and video content from the Google Chrome® browser to an in-room Crestron collaboration system. 

*  Connect to AirMedia® receiver devices on the network. 
*  Share a particular Chrome® browser tab (audio and video), or your complete desktop (video only). 
*  Multiple users can connect and present screens simultaneously.  

The Crestron AirMedia Sender for Chrome requires a compatible AirMedia device (such as AirMedia Series 3 receivers, AirMedia 2.0 receivers, or a device with integrated AirMedia functionality (Crestron Mercury® conference system and Crestron DMPS). 

Learn more at Crestron.com/AirMedia
long.ja,zh_CN,zh_TW:
The AirMedia® Extension for Google® Chrome™ allows users to wirelessly share content from a Google Chrome browser to an AirMedia®  capable receiver such as the AM-200/300, Mercury, or DMPS3-4K-350-C/250-C. 

Two modes enable sharing of content from a particular google chrome tab (with audio) or complete desktop sharing (without audio).

Why wireless presentation?
•	Frees people to sit or stand anywhere in the room or space and easily connect their laptops and smart devices to room display, regardless of OS
•	No more wires or dongles cluttering table – in fact, you don’t even need a table
•	Enable collaboration in flexible spaces – e.g., cafeterias, hallways, private offices

What is AirMedia®  2.0?
The fastest, easiest, most manageable, and secure wireless presentation technology. 
•	Simple to Use: Connect from almost any device on any network
•	Great Video: Smooth video playback with synchronized sound and real-time keyboard and mouse tracking
•	Secure Endpoint: Works with your existing infrastructure – not against it
•	Manage Remotely: Deploy and update without going from room-to-room
